issue.title: [C++][Docs] Include visibilty to ExecPlan APIs in Acero Docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17247](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17247). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Adding visibility in documentation to:

`ExecPlan`, `ExecNode`, `ExecBatch`, `Declaration` and `ExecFactoryRegistry`.

comments.body:
